jobs.title: CTO/Co-Founder/App Developer
jobs.description:
I am looking for a CTO/Co-Founder who would develop a mobile app and be in charge of our tech side. However, this is a super early stage and I cannot offer a salary, only equity once we are up and running.

If you have time to devote on a new project, I am flexible with working hours - you can do it in your own time as long as you are serious about it.

I can't say too much about the company here yet, but it focuses on reducing food waste and hunger. If this sounds of any interest to you, please drop me a message and we can discuss further. Thanks!

jobs.title: Market Researcher/Analyst - 1 Month Internship at a Sustainability Startup
jobs.description: I am working on an app to tackle the food waste issue we are facing. I am looking for someone to help out with the market analysis and business plan. You can work in your own time, no need to come to an office!
